segments.text: Oh man, this kitchen is a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's pouring out of the sink like nobody's business, and the woman's just standing there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's polishing that plate as if the flood at her feet doesn't exist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron's getting soaked, and she doesn't even flinch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are sneaking cookies from the jar while she's distracted.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy on the stool is going to fall and break his neck, I just know it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's legs are all crooked, tilting back dangerously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's egging him on, reaching up like she can't wait to grab one.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside the window, the garden looks perfect, which makes this mess even more irritating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not hear the water splashing everywhere?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle's spreading across the floor, ruining everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe they're getting away with this cookie theft right under her nose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to yell and stop this before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
